mapper.select: SELECT ps.score_id AS scoreId, ps.userid AS userId, u.username AS username, ps.game_date AS gameDate, ps.score AS score, ps.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM poker_scores ps JOIN users u ON ps.userid = u.userid ORDER BY ps.userid ASC, ps.game_date ASC

SELECT ps.score_id AS scoreId, ps.userid AS userId, u.username AS username, ps.game_date AS gameDate, ps.score AS score, ps.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM poker_scores ps JOIN users u ON ps.userid = u.userid WHERE ps.userid = #{userId} ORDER BY ps.game_date ASC
SELECT ps.score_id, ps.userid, u.username, ps.game_date, ps.score, ps.updated_at, ps.updated_by FROM poker_scores ps JOIN users u ON ps.userid = u.userid WHERE ps.score_id = #{scoreId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO poker_scores (userid, game_date, score, username) SELECT #{userId}, #{gameDate}, #{score}, u.username FROM users u WHERE u.userid = #{userId}
